headerDisplay: Homebridge plugin for creating delay/timer switches and sensors for delayed actions/automations

delay.title: Delay Time in Milliseconds
delay.description: Amount of time in milliseconds to wait since the switch is turned ON until the switch will be turned OFF and the sensor will trigger

actAsBulb.title: Add lightbulb instead of a switch
actAsBulb.description: This allows setting time by percentage when 1% = `delay` (e.g. `"delay": 60000` means 1% = 1 minute)

sensorType.title: Trigger Sensor Type
sensorType.description: The sensor type that will trigger when the time has ended ("None" for no sensor, "Motion Sensor" is default)

flipSensorState.title: Flip Sensor State
flipSensorState.description: Enable to flip the trigger sensor state (close/open, detected/not detected)

startOnReboot.title: Turn ON when Homebridge Restarts
startOnReboot.description: When Enabled, the switch will be turned ON and start the timer when HomeBridge server restarts
